Node.definition: = a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to be thirsty > to long for
Node.definition: = state in which someone experiences a deep longing to associate with another person or with a deity

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= state/process by which humans experience a deep longing to associate with another person or deity, ► to the extent that it results in a weakening of the body
= the physical body of humans and animals, not including the mind and the inner person

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= land in which there is a lack of water or rainfall, ► resulting in lack of vegetation and other desert like conditions; ≈ associated with thirst and hardship
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= the tabernacle or temple of YHWH, described in terms of its holiness
= action by which humans focus their eyes on someone or something in order to see it well

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= action by which humans express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to deities about who they are and what they do

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
literally: name; hence: = the core of one's identity, which reflect the essence of one's being
literally: to lift up (one's) hands; hence: = action by which humans raise their arms to receive out, beckon, bless, or pray

Node.gloss: to spread out one's hands > to pray
Node.definition: literally: to spread out or lift up one's palms; hence: = to present one's prayer and supplication before God by showing him one's empty hands
= fat parts ◄ of the body of animals and human beings; ► often the main ingredient of a sacrifice; ≈ regarded as the best part of the meat, but also associated with unresponsiveness and stubbornness
= state in which the body of humans or animals contains a significant quantity of fat, ≈ which used to be regarded as the best part and associated with health and well being
= process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
= a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70 80 centimeters wide; ► used by people of means to sleep on
= period of four hours during the night, divided as such for the sake of watchmen; ≈ associated with the notion of being unable to sleep
= action by which humans speak softly for themselves as if thinking out loud
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans (in both military and non military contexts) ► in order to make their life or work or task easier
= part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection
= action by which someone commits oneself to remain closely involved with another person or group, out of affection and/or solidarity

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
literally: destruction; hence: = an event that has a great negative impact on one's life, possessions and well being
= action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression

= animal that looks like a longhaired dog with a pointed nose and a bushy tail; either reddish with white underparts (fox) or yellowish brown with red tips to the fur on the back (jackal); scavenger; ≈ associated with destruction and devastation, and also with being insignificant but self important
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which humans experience great joy and act accordingly
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: falsehood; hence: = state in which things that are being communicated are factually untrue
